title: Marketing Manager
content:
About the role
Reporting to the CEO, the first member of our marketing team will be responsible for partnering closely with our engineering team to launch products, foster our community of developers, drive our pipeline, and influence revenue. You will play a critical role within the organization by telling Chalk’s story, laying the foundation for Chalk’s marketing technology, and leading marketing activities that help us connect with current and future customers. This is your opportunity to join us in-person as an early employee and make a visible impact at a high growth start-up. 
What you will do

Drive product launches with educational content, GTM assets, and market research
Tell compelling stories through case studies, pitch decks, and videos that communicate how Chalk addresses pain points and delivers value for our customers
Build sales collateral including presentations, white papers, and product demos
Manage and optimize Chalk’s website, including landing pages, sign-up forms, etc.
Track, test, report, and analyze campaign performance
Work with Sales to continuously improve lead scoring, qualification, quality, and lead follow-up 

What we’re looking for

5+ years of experience in product marketing (especially experience with B2B / enterprise / developer tools)
An understanding of ML/data and/or intuition for how to create content for data and machine learning engineers
Excellent written and verbal communication, problem-solving, storytelling, and analytical skills
Experience working closely with engineering teams

Bonus points

Experience marketing ML/data products or services
Understanding of Machine Learning Ops/Infrastructure
Technical background including experience writing software, working as a data scientist, or building ML models

Inclusivity
Chalk is an equal opportunity employer. We value diversity and inclusion and provide reasonable accommodations to anyone in need of individualized support.
